channel.title: Podcastheroes
channel.description:
Andrew and Groove both love the new NBC Hit Heroes and decided to do a Podcast.
We plan to do weekly shows after each new episode of Heroes. PodcastHeroes Expect FUN LAUGHS AND SINGING :-)
channel.itunes:subtitle: We talk about NBC's Heroes
channel.itunes:author: Andrew And Groove
